message: When I wake, it's already past noon.
I had to check my Coil for the time. It's always night in Platinum Jail.
I get out of bed, turn on Ren, and head out into the hall.
I can hear voices in the living room.
Mink is sitting on the sofa, talking to someone on his Coil. A curl of smoke rises from the pipe in his hand.

name: ミンク
message: "...Yeah. Got it."
Mink's conversation happens to end the moment I take a few nervous steps into the room.
He looks at me and blows a puff of white smoke.
Then he stands and tosses something to me.
I barely catch it. It's a bun.

name: ミンク
message: "We're going out."

So... "hurry up and eat?"
I glance from the bun to Mink and back.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Out where?"

name: ミンク
message: "On a little errand."
With that, Mink heads downstairs.

name: 蒼葉
message: "An errand? What the hell is that supposed to mean..."

name: 蓮
message: "You'll have to join him to find out."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I guess you're right..."

name: トリ
message: "Hurry up before we leave without you."
Mink's bird does a circle above us before following his master.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I have no idea what's going on."
After what happened yesterday, I have no idea how to interact with Mink anymore.
Yesterday, I... maybe it was just the drugs or something, but I kinda lost my mind.
I definitely said and did some insane shit.
But why did he go along with it?
He could've knocked me out cold with a single punch.
So why didn't he?
...I know he won't answer if I ask.
Still, one thing is clear.
Mink is after Toue.
And since our objectives are the same, it makes sense for me to stick with him.
I mean, really, it makes more sense than going it alone.
I have to follow him.
At least, that's what I tell myself.
Cramming the bun in my mouth, I run back to get my things. Then I head downstairs.
